.content-panel .content-type-title > p {

}

  font-weight: bold;

}

text-align: justify;
}

padding: 5px 20px;
}

padding: 0 0.5em;

}

{
    border: 1px solid #000;
    border-collapse: collapse;
}
.content-panel-table-cell
{
    vertical-align: top;
    padding: 0 2px;
}

width:100%;
margin-top:0;
}

border:none;
}

}

}

border: none;
width: 50%;
}
.rowt{

}

}
.celd{

}
.alph{

}

table.alph tr{

}
table.alph td{
border:none;
text-align:center;
width: 50%;
